name: hipmob
summary: Hipmob provides integrated live chat and help desk article search for mobile apps.
description:
Hipmob is a real-time communication framework that lets you talk to your
users directly inside your app. Once the Hipmob SDK is integrated into
your app then the user can simply start a conversation with you and never
have to switch to a different app to talk. The Hipmob live chat solution
supports text and images, as well as push notifications to allow you to
bring customers back to your app in response to help queries.
